name: RIVER
description: I'm an affectionate guy who loves to make new friends.

name: COSMO
description: I enjoy walks, and absolutely LOVE to play! I would be a great running partner with a little practice!

name: KOVU
description: Calm and wise, Kovu enjoys quiet naps and warm laps.

name: KIARA
description: Loyal and curious, Kiara is a gentle soul who loves window watching.

name: ANCHOVY
description: Playful and smart, Anchovy will bring fun energy to your home.

name: VELVET
description: A sleek little panther who loves to snuggle and pounce.

name: MAJOR MELON
description: Bursting with energy, this orange boy is ready to play!

name: CONWAY
description: Smart and friendly pup who loves long walks and tug-of-war.
